All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Entry class of the program.
Border
The sides of a Tile.
Cable
Wires Tiles in a Circuit.
Circuit
Electrical parts linked together via cable or wifi.
Component
A Component is a part of an electrical circuit.
IllegalBorderException
Thrownd when the border given for Tile creation is incompatible with its shape.
IllegalPositionException
To be throwned when the position in a matrix is not valid.
IllegalTileShapeException
To be throwned when tile shapes are not valid.
Level
 
LevelConfig
 
Link
A connection, physical or not, between Tiles.
LoopException
Throwned when a Link loops.
MultipleLinkException
Throwned when attempted to link Tiles that were already linked.
NotAHotspotException
Throwned when attempted to create Wifi with a Tile that dit not contain a Hotspot.
NotYetConnectedException
Throwned when attempted to remove a side from a Border that was not yet connected.
OversizedBorderException
Throwed when attempted to add a side on a Border that reached its maximum allowed number of connected sides.
Position
Represents a position in a matrix.
Tile
Represents a tile of Energy.
TileShape
The shape of a Tile.
Vertex
Represents a Vertex in a Graph.
Wifi
A wireless link between Tiles that contain Hotspots.
